00020 void init(void)
00021 {
00022   int i, j;
00023   double a3;
00024 
00025   All.Time = All.TimeBegin;
00026 
00027   switch (All.ICFormat)
00028     {
00029     case 1:
00030 #if (MAKEGLASS > 1)
00031       seed_glass();
00032 #else
00033       read_ic(All.InitCondFile);
00034 #endif
00035       break;
00036     case 2:
00037     case 3:
00038       read_ic(All.InitCondFile);
00039       break;
00040     default:
00041       if(ThisTask == 0)
00042         printf("ICFormat=%d not supported.\n", All.ICFormat);
00043       endrun(0);
00044     }
00045 
00046   All.Time = All.TimeBegin;
00047   All.Ti_Current = 0;
00048 
00049   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00050     {
00051       All.Timebase_interval = (log(All.TimeMax) - log(All.TimeBegin)) / TIMEBASE;
00052       a3 = All.Time * All.Time * All.Time;
00053     }
00054   else
00055     {
00056       All.Timebase_interval = (All.TimeMax - All.TimeBegin) / TIMEBASE;
00057       a3 = 1;
00058     }
00059 
00060   set_softenings();
00061 
00062   All.NumCurrentTiStep = 0;     /* setup some counters */
00063   All.SnapshotFileCount = 0;
00064 
00065 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00066   All.Nself_interactions = 0;
00067   for (i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00068     for(j = 0; j < PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS; j++)
00069       InteractionTable[i][j]= 0;
00070 #endif
00071 
00072   if(RestartFlag == 2)
00073     All.SnapshotFileCount = atoi(All.InitCondFile + strlen(All.InitCondFile) - 3) + 1;
00074 
00075   All.TotNumOfForces = 0;
00076   All.NumForcesSinceLastDomainDecomp = 0;
00077 
00078   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00079     if(All.PeriodicBoundariesOn == 1)
00080       check_omega();
00081 
00082   All.TimeLastStatistics = All.TimeBegin - All.TimeBetStatistics;
00083 
00084   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn) /*  change to new velocity variable */
00085     {
00086       for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00087         for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00088           P[i].Vel[j] *= sqrt(All.Time) * All.Time;
00089     }
00090 
00091   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)  /*  start-up initialization */
00092     {
00093       for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00094         P[i].GravAccel[j] = 0;
00095 #ifdef PMGRID
00096       for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00097         P[i].GravPM[j] = 0;
00098 #endif
00099       P[i].Ti_endstep = 0;
00100       P[i].Ti_begstep = 0;
00101 
00102       P[i].OldAcc = 0;
00103       P[i].GravCost = 1;
00104       P[i].Potential = 0;
00105     }
00106 
00107 #ifdef PMGRID
00108   All.PM_Ti_endstep = All.PM_Ti_begstep = 0;
00109 #endif
00110 
00111 #ifdef FLEXSTEPS
00112   All.PresentMinStep = TIMEBASE;
00113   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)  /*  start-up initialization */
00114     {
00115       P[i].FlexStepGrp = (int) (TIMEBASE * get_random_number(P[i].ID));
00116     }
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 
00120   for(i = 0; i < N_gas; i++)    /* initialize sph_properties */
00121     {
00122       for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00123         {
00124           SphP[i].VelPred[j] = P[i].Vel[j];
00125           SphP[i].HydroAccel[j] = 0;
00126         }
00127 
00128       SphP[i].DtEntropy = 0;
00129 
00130       if(RestartFlag == 0)
00131         {
00132           SphP[i].Hsml = 0;
00133           SphP[i].Density = -1;
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137   ngb_treeallocate(MAX_NGB);
00138 
00139   force_treeallocate(All.TreeAllocFactor * All.MaxPart, All.MaxPart);
00140 
00141   All.NumForcesSinceLastDomainDecomp = 1 + All.TotNumPart * All.TreeDomainUpdateFrequency;
00142 
00143   Flag_FullStep = 1;            /* to ensure that Peano-Hilber order is done */
00144 
00145   domain_Decomposition();       /* do initial domain decomposition (gives equal numbers of particles) */
00146 
00147   ngb_treebuild();              /* will build tree */
00148 
00149   setup_smoothinglengths();
00150 
00151   TreeReconstructFlag = 1;
00152 
00153   /* at this point, the entropy variable normally contains the 
00154    * internal energy, read in from the initial conditions file, unless the file
00155    * explicitly signals that the initial conditions contain the entropy directly. 
00156    * Once the density has been computed, we can convert thermal energy to entropy.
00157    */
00158 #ifndef ISOTHERM_EQS
00159   if(header.flag_entropy_instead_u == 0)
00160     for(i = 0; i < N_gas; i++)
00161       SphP[i].Entropy = GAMMA_MINUS1 * SphP[i].Entropy / pow(SphP[i].Density / a3, GAMMA_MINUS1);
00162 #endif
00163 }

00165 
00169 void check_omega(void)
00170 {
00171   double mass = 0, masstot, omega;
00172   int i;
00173 
00174   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00175     mass += P[i].Mass;
00176 
00177   MPI_Allreduce(&mass, &masstot, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00178 
00179   omega =
00180     masstot / (All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize) / (3 * All.Hubble * All.Hubble / (8 * M_PI * All.G));
00181 
00182   if(fabs(omega - All.Omega0) > 1.0e-3)
00183     {
00184       if(ThisTask == 0)
00185         {
00186           printf("\n\nI've found something odd!\n");
00187           printf
00188             ("The mass content accounts only for Omega=%g,\nbut you specified Omega=%g in the parameterfile.\n",
00189              omega, All.Omega0);
00190           printf("\nI better stop.\n");
00191 
00192           fflush(stdout);
00193         }
00194       endrun(1);
00195     }
00196 }

00206 void setup_smoothinglengths(void)
00207 {
00208   int i, no, p;
00209 
00210   if(RestartFlag == 0)
00211     {
00212 
00213       for(i = 0; i < N_gas; i++)
00214         {
00215           no = Father[i];
00216 
00217           while(10 * All.DesNumNgb * P[i].Mass > Nodes[no].u.d.mass)
00218             {
00219               p = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00220 
00221               if(p < 0)
00222                 break;
00223 
00224               no = p;
00225             }
00226 #ifndef TWODIMS
00227           SphP[i].Hsml =
00228             pow(3.0 / (4 * M_PI) * All.DesNumNgb * P[i].Mass / Nodes[no].u.d.mass, 1.0 / 3) * Nodes[no].len;
00229 #else
00230           SphP[i].Hsml =
00231             pow(1.0 / (M_PI) * All.DesNumNgb * P[i].Mass / Nodes[no].u.d.mass, 1.0 / 2) * Nodes[no].len;
00232 #endif
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00236   density();
00237 }

00243 #if (MAKEGLASS > 1)
00244 void seed_glass(void)
00245 {
00246   int i, k, n_for_this_task;
00247   double Range[3], LowerBound[3];
00248   double drandom, partmass;
00249   long long IDstart;
00250 
00251   All.TotNumPart = MAKEGLASS;
00252   partmass = All.Omega0 * (3 * All.Hubble * All.Hubble / (8 * M_PI * All.G))
00253     * (All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize) / All.TotNumPart;
00254 
00255   All.MaxPart = All.PartAllocFactor * (All.TotNumPart / NTask); /* sets the maximum number of particles that may */
00256 
00257   allocate_memory();
00258 
00259   header.npartTotal[1] = All.TotNumPart;
00260   header.mass[1] = partmass;
00261 
00262   if(ThisTask == 0)
00263     {
00264       printf("\nGlass initialising\nPartMass= %g\n", partmass);
00265       printf("TotNumPart= %d%09d\n\n",
00266              (int) (All.TotNumPart / 1000000000), (int) (All.TotNumPart % 1000000000));
00267     }
00268 
00269   /* set the number of particles assigned locally to this task */
00270   n_for_this_task = All.TotNumPart / NTask;
00271 
00272   if(ThisTask == NTask - 1)
00273     n_for_this_task = All.TotNumPart - (NTask - 1) * n_for_this_task;
00274 
00275   NumPart = 0;
00276   IDstart = 1 + (All.TotNumPart / NTask) * ThisTask;
00277 
00278   /* split the temporal domain into Ntask slabs in z-direction */
00279 
00280   Range[0] = Range[1] = All.BoxSize;
00281   Range[2] = All.BoxSize / NTask;
00282   LowerBound[0] = LowerBound[1] = 0;
00283   LowerBound[2] = ThisTask * Range[2];
00284 
00285   srand48(ThisTask);
00286 
00287   for(i = 0; i < n_for_this_task; i++)
00288     {
00289       for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00290         {
00291           drandom = drand48();
00292 
00293           P[i].Pos[k] = LowerBound[k] + Range[k] * drandom;
00294           P[i].Vel[k] = 0;
00295         }
00296 
00297       P[i].Mass = partmass;
00298       P[i].Type = 1;
00299       P[i].ID = IDstart + i;
00300 
00301       NumPart++;
00302     }
00303 }
00304 #endif
